question:
State the race and year of race in which Michael Schumacher had his fastest lap.
fastest lap refers to min(milliseconds); Alex Yoong refers to the full name of the driver; Full name of the driver refers to drivers.forename and drivers.surname;
query: SELECT T1.name, T1.year FROM races AS T1 INNER JOIN lapTimes AS T2 ON T2.raceId = T1.raceId INNER JOIN drivers AS T3 ON T3.driverId = T2.driverId WHERE T3.forename = 'Michael' AND T3.surname = 'Schumacher' ORDER BY T2.milliseconds ASC NULLS FIRST LIMIT 1
